hotels.vendor_name: Hotel de la Coupole, MGallery Sapa Vietnam
hotels.title: Glamorous French-Inspired Sapa Valley Hotel with Marble Indoor Pool, Wellness Spa & Fine Dining
hotels.description: In the heart of Vietnam's highland region, discover an MGallery hotel that effortlessly blends French colonial design with the vibrant colours and patterns of the local Sapa Valley hill communities. This exquisite estate boasts a breathtaking indoor pool, flanked by emerald marble and chandeliers, and the sumptuous Golden Era-inspired Nuages Spa. Explore the local area, with its verdant tea plantations, shimmering waterfalls and bustling markets. On your return to the hotel, dine at Chic, a French-inspired restaurant serving up gourmet dishes, or head to Absinthe, a rooftop bar with panoramic views.
